STATIC_heading.text: REVIEW SHEET

STATIC_text.text: Write meanings for combining forms and suffixes in the spaces provided. Check your answers with information in Chapter 5 and this chapter or in the Glossary (Medical Word Parts—English) at the end of this book.
Instructions: Click or tap on the plus sign to reveal the opposite side of the card.
Please visit the Evolve website for additional exercises, games, and images related to this chapter.
